titleStmt.title: Causes of the Lords vvrath against Scotland, manifested in his sad late dispensations. Whereunto is added a paper, particularly holding forth the sins of the ministery.
titleStmt.author: Warriston, Archibald Johnston, Lord, 1611-1663.

titleStmt.title: Causes of the Lords vvrath against Scotland, manifested in his sad late dispensations. Whereunto is added a paper, particularly holding forth the sins of the ministery.
titleStmt.author: Warriston, Archibald Johnston, Lord, 1611-1663.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Archibald Johnson, Lord Warriston.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
"A humble acknowledgment of the sins of the ministery of Scotland" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Annotation on Thomason copy on E.691[11]: "Aprill"; on E.691[12]: "Aprill"; "Postscript which cannot be gotton printed .." on final page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
